entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
